Olamide Adu is the CEO and Founder of EU StudyAssist. He is Data Scientist with a background in Forestry and Sustainable Nature Management, a graduate of the Sustainable Forest and Nature Management program from the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences in 2023. He has a passion for Data Science and is a big lover of the R Language. He is adept at using R to solve nature management problems.
